featured.text: Why did Prime Minister Ryu Matsumoto resign from office?
In 2011, a minister, Ryu Matsumoto, was forced to resign after only a week in office, when a bad-tempered encounter with local officials was televised.

definition.zh_def: 松本，通常指日本的一個地名或姓氏。
definition.en_def: Matsumoto, typically referring to a place name or surname in Japan.
definition.example: Matsumoto is known for its beautiful castle and scenic mountains.
